pyqgis_plugin.name: DataSync
pyqgis_plugin.description: Bulk-import Excel updates into PostgreSQL/PostGIS databases with preview and column mapping
pyqgis_plugin.about: DataSync allows you to synchronize data between Excel files and PostgreSQL databases. Features include: Use existing QGIS PostgreSQL connections, Configurable column mapping via UI, Preview mode showing changes before committing, Transaction-based updates with rollback on error, Color-coded diff view (green=add, orange=update)
